00136 void HandleCharProfile()
00137 { 
00138       if( fReDrawCharProfile )
00139   {
00140             // re draw
00141     RenderCharProfile( );
00142             fReDrawCharProfile = FALSE;
00143 
00144       }
00145 
00146       // button pending, but not changing mode, still need a rernder, but under different circumstances
00147       if( ( fButtonPendingFlag == TRUE )&&( iCurrentImpPage == iPreviousImpPage ) )
00148       {
00149             RenderCharProfile( );
00150       }
00151 
00152       // page has changed, handle the fact..get rid of old page, load up new, and re render
00153       if( ( iCurrentImpPage != iPreviousImpPage ) )
00154       {
00155             if( fDoneLoadPending == FALSE )
00156             {
00157                   //make sure we are not hosing memory
00158                   Assert( iCurrentImpPage <= IMP_NUM_PAGES );
00159 
00160                   
00161                   fFastLoadFlag = HasTheCurrentIMPPageBeenVisited( );
00162                   fVisitedIMPSubPages[ iCurrentImpPage ] = TRUE;
00163                   fConnectingToSubPage = TRUE;
00164 
00165                   if( iPreviousImpPage != -1 )
00166                   {
00167                         fLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
00168                         MarkButtonsDirty();
00169                         return;
00170                   }
00171                   else
00172                   {
00173                         fDoneLoadPending = TRUE;
00174                   }
00175 
00176                   
00177             }
00178 
00179             fVisitedIMPSubPages[ iCurrentImpPage ] = TRUE;
00180 
00181             if( fButtonPendingFlag == TRUE )
00182             {
00183       // render screen
00184       RenderCharProfile( );
00185               return;
00186             }
00187 
00188             // exity old mode
00189     ExitOldIMPMode( );
00190 
00191             // set previous page
00192             iPreviousImpPage = iCurrentImpPage;
00193 
00194             // enter new
00195     EnterNewIMPMode( );
00196 
00197             
00198             // render screen
00199     RenderCharProfile( );
00200     
00201              // render title bar
00202 
00203             
00204       
00205       }
00206 
00207       // handle
00208   switch( iCurrentImpPage )
00209        {
00210              case( IMP_HOME_PAGE ):
00211                    HandleImpHomePage( );
00212              break;
00213              case( IMP_BEGIN ):
00214                HandleIMPBeginScreen( );
00215              break;
00216              case( IMP_PERSONALITY ):
00217                  HandleIMPPersonalityEntrance( );
00218              break;
00219              case( IMP_PERSONALITY_QUIZ ):
00220                  HandleIMPSkillTrait( );
00221              break;
00222              case( IMP_PERSONALITY_FINISH ):
00223                  HandleIMPPersonalityFinish( );
00224              break;
00225              case( IMP_ATTRIBUTE_ENTRANCE ):
00226                  HandleIMPAttributeEntrance( );
00227              break;
00228              case( IMP_ATTRIBUTE_PAGE ):
00229                    HandleIMPAttributeSelection( );
00230              break;
00231              case( IMP_ATTRIBUTE_FINISH ):
00232              HandleIMPAttributeFinish( );
00233              break;
00234              case( IMP_PORTRAIT ):
00235              HandleIMPPortraits( );
00236              break;
00237              case( IMP_VOICE ):
00238              HandleIMPVoices( );
00239              break;
00240              case( IMP_FINISH ):
00241              HandleIMPFinish( );
00242              break;
00243              case( IMP_ABOUT_US ):
00244              HandleIMPAboutUs( );
00245              break;
00246              case( IMP_MAIN_PAGE ):
00247                    HandleIMPMainPage( );
00248              break;
00249              case( IMP_CONFIRM ):
00250                  HandleIMPConfirm( );
00251              break;
00252        }
00253 
00254       return;
00255 }

00257 void RenderCharProfile()
00258 {
00259       // button is waiting to go up?...do nothing, 
00260 
00261        if( fButtonPendingFlag )
00262        {    
00263              fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00264              fButtonPendingFlag = FALSE;
00265              return;
00266        }
00267 
00268        switch( iCurrentImpPage )
00269        {
00270              case( IMP_HOME_PAGE ):
00271                    RenderImpHomePage( );
00272              break;
00273              case( IMP_BEGIN ):
00274                RenderIMPBeginScreen( );
00275              break;
00276              case( IMP_PERSONALITY ):
00277                    RenderIMPPersonalityEntrance( );
00278              break;
00279              case( IMP_PERSONALITY_QUIZ ):
00280                    RenderIMPSkillTrait( );
00281             break;
00282              case( IMP_PERSONALITY_FINISH ):
00283                RenderIMPPersonalityFinish( );
00284              break;
00285              case( IMP_ATTRIBUTE_ENTRANCE ):
00286                    RenderIMPAttributeEntrance( );
00287              break;
00288              case( IMP_ATTRIBUTE_PAGE ):
00289              RenderIMPAttributeSelection( );
00290              break;
00291              case( IMP_ATTRIBUTE_FINISH ):
00292              RenderIMPAttributeFinish( );
00293              break;
00294              case( IMP_PORTRAIT ):
00295              RenderIMPPortraits( );
00296              break;
00297              case( IMP_VOICE ):
00298              RenderIMPVoices( );
00299              break;
00300              case( IMP_FINISH ):
00301              RenderIMPFinish( );
00302              break;
00303              case( IMP_ABOUT_US ):
00304              RenderIMPAboutUs( );
00305              break;
00306              case( IMP_MAIN_PAGE ):
00307                  RenderIMPMainPage( );
00308              break;
00309              case( IMP_CONFIRM ):
00310                  RenderIMPConfirm( );
00311              break;
00312        }
00313 
00314        // render title bar
00315        //RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00316 
00317    // render the text
00318        PrintImpText( );
00319    
00320        RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00321 
00322        DisplayProgramBoundingBox( TRUE );
00323 
00324        //InvalidateRegion( 0, 0, 640, 480 );
00325        return;
00326 
00327 }

00330 void ExitOldIMPMode( void )
00331 {
00332   // exit old mode
00333   
00334       if( iPreviousImpPage == -1 )
00335       {
00336             // don't both, leave
00337         return;
00338 
00339       }
00340       // remove old mode
00341        switch( iPreviousImpPage )
00342        {
00343              case( IMP_HOME_PAGE ):
00344                    ExitImpHomePage( );
00345              break;
00346              case( IMP_BEGIN ):
00347              DestroyIMPButtons( );
00348                  ExitIMPBeginScreen( );
00349              break;
00350              case( IMP_FINISH ):
00351              DestroyIMPButtons( );
00352                  ExitIMPFinish( );
00353              break;
00354              case( IMP_PERSONALITY ):
00355                    DestroyIMPButtons( );
00356                    ExitIMPPersonalityEntrance( );
00357              break;
00358              case( IMP_PERSONALITY_QUIZ ):
00359                    DestroyIMPButtons( );
00360 //                 ExitIMPPersonalityQuiz( );
00361                    ExitIMPSkillTrait( );
00362              break;
00363              case( IMP_PERSONALITY_FINISH ):
00364                    DestroyIMPButtons( );
00365                  ExitIMPPersonalityFinish( );
00366              break;
00367              case( IMP_ATTRIBUTE_ENTRANCE ):
00368                    DestroyIMPButtons( );
00369                    ExitIMPAttributeEntrance( );
00370              break;
00371              case( IMP_ATTRIBUTE_PAGE ):
00372                    DestroyIMPButtons( );
00373              ExitIMPAttributeSelection( );
00374              break;
00375              case( IMP_ATTRIBUTE_FINISH ):
00376                    DestroyIMPButtons( );
00377              ExitIMPAttributeFinish( );
00378              break;
00379              case( IMP_PORTRAIT ):
00380                    DestroyIMPButtons( );
00381              ExitIMPPortraits( );
00382              break;
00383              case( IMP_VOICE ):
00384                    DestroyIMPButtons( );
00385              ExitIMPVoices( );
00386              break;
00387              case( IMP_ABOUT_US ):
00388              ExitIMPAboutUs( );
00389              break;
00390              case( IMP_MAIN_PAGE ):
00391                  ExitIMPMainPage( );
00392              break;
00393               case( IMP_CONFIRM ):
00394                  ExitIMPConfirm( );
00395              break;
00396        }
00397 
00398       return;
00399 }

00403 void EnterNewIMPMode( void )
00404 {
00405   // enter new mode
00406   
00407        switch( iCurrentImpPage )
00408        {
00409              case( IMP_HOME_PAGE ):
00410                    EnterImpHomePage( );
00411              break;
00412              case( IMP_BEGIN ):
00413                    CreateIMPButtons( );
00414                  EnterIMPBeginScreen( );
00415              break;
00416              case( IMP_FINISH ):
00417                    CreateIMPButtons( );
00418                  EnterIMPFinish( );
00419              break;
00420              case( IMP_PERSONALITY ):
00421                    CreateIMPButtons( );
00422                    EnterIMPPersonalityEntrance( );
00423              break;
00424              case( IMP_PERSONALITY_QUIZ ):
00425                    CreateIMPButtons( );
00426 //                 EnterIMPPersonalityQuiz( );
00427                    EnterIMPSkillTrait( );
00428              break;
00429              case( IMP_PERSONALITY_FINISH ):
00430                    CreateIMPButtons( );
00431                  EnterIMPPersonalityFinish( );
00432              break;
00433              case( IMP_ATTRIBUTE_ENTRANCE ):
00434                    CreateIMPButtons( );
00435                    EnterIMPAttributeEntrance( );
00436              break;
00437              case( IMP_ATTRIBUTE_PAGE ):
00438              CreateIMPButtons( );
00439              EnterIMPAttributeSelection( );
00440              break;
00441              case( IMP_ATTRIBUTE_FINISH ):
00442                    CreateIMPButtons( );
00443              EnterIMPAttributeFinish( );
00444              break;
00445              case( IMP_PORTRAIT ):
00446                    CreateIMPButtons( );
00447              EnterIMPPortraits( );
00448              break;
00449              case( IMP_VOICE ):
00450                    CreateIMPButtons( );
00451              EnterIMPVoices( );
00452              break;
00453              case( IMP_ABOUT_US ):
00454              EnterIMPAboutUs( );
00455              break;
00456              case( IMP_MAIN_PAGE ):
00457                  EnterIMPMainPage( );
00458              break;
00459              case( IMP_CONFIRM ):
00460                  EnterIMPConfirm( );
00461              break;
00462        }
00463 
00464        
00465 
00466       return;
00467 }

00470 void ResetCharacterStats( void )
00471 {
00472   // attributes
00473   iStrength = 55;
00474   iDexterity = 55;
00475   iAgility = 55;
00476   iWisdom = 55;
00477   iLeadership =55;
00478   iHealth = 55;
00479 
00480   // skills
00481   iMarksmanship = 55;
00482   iMedical = 55; 
00483   iExplosives = 55;
00484   iMechanical = 55;
00485 
00486       // skills
00487   iSkillA = 0;
00488   iSkillB = 0;
00489 
00490   // personality
00491   iPersonality = 0;
00492 
00493   // attitude
00494   iAttitude = 0;
00495 
00496       // names
00497       memset( &pFullName, 0 , sizeof( pFullName) );
00498       memset( &pNickName, 0 , sizeof( pNickName) );
00499 
00500 
00501 }

00604 void CreateIMPButtons( void )
00605 {
00606   // create all the buttons global to the IMP system
00607 
00608   giIMPButtonImage[ 0 ] = LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\button_3.sti" ,-1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00609       
00610 
00611       // cancel
00612       giIMPButton[0] = CreateIconAndTextButton( giIMPButtonImage[0], pImpButtonText[ 19 ], FONT12ARIAL, 
00613                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00614                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00615                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00616                                                                                      LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + 15, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + ( 360 ), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00617                                                                                      BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPCancelCallback);
00618   
00619       SpecifyButtonTextSubOffsets( giIMPButton[0], 0, -1, FALSE );
00620       
00621       // set up generic www cursor
00622       SetButtonCursor(giIMPButton[ 0 ], CURSOR_WWW);
00623 
00624       return;
00625 }
00626 
00627 void DestroyIMPButtons( void )
00628 {
00629   // destroy the buttons we created
00630       RemoveButton(giIMPButton[0] );
00631   UnloadButtonImage(giIMPButtonImage[0] );
00632 
00633       return;
00634 }
00635 
00636 void BtnIMPCancelCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00637 {
00638    // btn callback for IMP cancel button
00639       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00640             return;
00641 
00642       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00643       {
00644              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00645       }
00646   
00647       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00648       {
00649             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00650             {
00651    
00652                   btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00653 
00654                   // back to the main page, otherwise, back to home page
00655                   if( iCurrentImpPage == IMP_MAIN_PAGE )
00656                   {
00657                     iCurrentImpPage = IMP_HOME_PAGE;
00658                     fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00659                     iCurrentProfileMode = 0;
00660                     fFinishedCharGeneration = FALSE;
00661                     ResetCharacterStats( );
00662                   }
00663                   else if( iCurrentImpPage == IMP_FINISH )
00664                   {     
00665                         iCurrentImpPage = IMP_MAIN_PAGE;
00666                         iCurrentProfileMode = 4;
00667                         fFinishedCharGeneration = FALSE;
00668                       fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00669                       //iCurrentProfileMode = 0;
00670                       //fFinishedCharGeneration = FALSE;
00671                       //ResetCharacterStats( );
00672 
00673                   }
00674 
00675                   else if( iCurrentImpPage == IMP_PERSONALITY_QUIZ || iCurrentImpPage == IMP_PERSONALITY_FINISH)
00676                   {
00677                         giMaxPersonalityQuizQuestion = 0;
00678             fStartOverFlag = TRUE;
00679                         iCurrentAnswer = -1;
00680                         iCurrentImpPage = IMP_PERSONALITY;
00681                         fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00682                   }
00683 
00684                   else 
00685                   {
00686                         if( iCurrentImpPage == IMP_ATTRIBUTE_PAGE )
00687                         {
00688                               SetAttributes( );
00689                               fFirstIMPAttribTime = TRUE;
00690                         }
00691                     iCurrentImpPage = IMP_MAIN_PAGE;
00692                         iCurrentAnswer = -1;
00693                   }
00694     }
00695       }
00696 
00697 
00698       return;
00699 }

00701 
00702 void InitIMPSubPageList( void )
00703 {
00704       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00705 
00706       for(iCounter = 0; iCounter < IMP_CONFIRM; iCounter++ )
00707       {
00708             fVisitedIMPSubPages[ iCounter ] = FALSE ;
00709       }
00710 
00711       return;
00712 }
00713 
00714 BOOLEAN HasTheCurrentIMPPageBeenVisited( void )
00715 {
00716       // returns if we have vsisted the current IMP PageAlready
00717 
00718       //make sure we are not hosing memory
00719       Assert( iCurrentImpPage <= IMP_NUM_PAGES );
00720 
00721       return ( fVisitedIMPSubPages[ iCurrentImpPage ]);
00722 }
